lead_paragraph: Deutsche Bank Chairman Paul Achleitner has ruled out a European merger or a state bailout after the lender's mortgage settlement with the U.S. Department of Justice, Frankfurter Allgemeine Sonntagszeitung reported.
snippet: Deutsche Bank Chairman Paul Achleitner has ruled out a European merger or a state bailout after the lender's mortgage settlement with the U.S. Department of Justice, Frankfurter Allgemeine Sonntagszeitung reported....

headline.main: Deutsche Bank Chairman Rules Out European Merger-Frankfurter Allgemeine
headline.print_headline: Deutsche Bank Chairman Rules Out European Merger-Frankfurter Allgemeine
